name: AUTO RUN
description:
Marvin's wiring has come loose, and now he's out of control! Help guide him through 14 Game Boy inspired stages, making sure to avoid spikes and other glitching robots.

Controls:

  • A: Sliding doors
  • S: Alt sliding doors
  • D: Spikes
  • Space: Selection/Start
  • R: Reset
  • M: Menu

Made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.
